english: Good evening to all our listeners !
"how do you do to-night, sir?" said sampson, peeping in .
chinese: “晚上好，阁下？”桑普杰说，探进头来。

english: Good evening, mr. faber. we started without you--i hope you don't mind .
chinese: 晚上好，费伯先生！我们没等您回来就开始了，请不要见怪。

english: However, he did not seem at all ferocious, and only said gruffly "good evening, beauty. "
chinese: 然而，他看上去似乎一点也不凶狠，只是粗嗄地说，“晚上好，美女。”

english: Good evening , sir . we ' re from the groom ' s side
chinese: 晚上好，先生我们是男方家的亲戚
晚上好造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Good evening , mr . jones . i ' m sorry i ' m late
chinese: 晚上好,琼斯先生。很抱歉我迟到了。

english: Oh , my goodness . - good evening , mr frohman
chinese: 喔~我的天啊! -晚上好，弗罗曼先生

english: [ overp . a . ] goodevening , folks . uh , i ' m sandylyle ,
chinese: 观众们,晚上好我是桑迪?莱尔

english: Good evening , mr . jones . i ' m sorry i ' m late
chinese: 晚上好,琼斯先生。很抱歉我迟到了。

english: Guest : good evening . i ' d like a table for four , please
chinese: 晚上好，我要一个四人桌。

english: He began his prologue by saying " good night "
chinese: 他以“晚上好”开始了他的开场白。

english: Eddy : good evening , mrs . collins . how are you
chinese: 艾迪：晚上好，科林斯太太。你好吗

english: Good evening . today is wednesday , september 24 . .
chinese: 晚上好今天是9月24日，星期三

english: Good evening . i ' d like to thank everybody for coming
chinese: 晚上好，谢谢每位光临的朋友

english: B : good evening , sir . are you mr . david
chinese: （晚上好，先生，请问您是大卫先生吗？ ）
